snippet: With the signing of Jon Niese and the big-league debut of Kirk Nieuwenhuis, the Mets showed off a lineup dominated by players they drafted and developed.
abstract: Signing of pitcher Jon Niese and the big-league debut of center fielder Kirk Nieuwenhuis gives the New York Mets an opportunity to show off a lineup dominated by players they drafted and developed.
lead_paragraph: With the signing of Jon Niese and the big-league debut of Kirk Nieuwenhuis, the Mets showed off a lineup dominated by players they drafted and developed.

headline.seo: Mets Show Off Lineup of Players They Drafted and Developed
headline.main: Hopeful Signs for a Homegrown Mets Roster
headline.print_headline: Hopeful Signs for a Homegrown Roster
